channel.title: Ipod Touch Upgrade on shiv.me
channel.description: Recent content in Ipod Touch Upgrade on shiv.me

item.title: Bye bye IPOD
item.description: Since I don’t enjoyed being screwed over when I buy a $500 product, I said buh-bye to my ipod touch today. One thing that I enjoyed, was the sharpness of the display. I will definetly buy this device again, if I knew for sure that, Apple will not pull another stunt like that with the imminent release of IPOD touch SDK. So until then, I commute for 2 hours everyday with no music to listen, no podcast from CNN to watch :(
